    • ifCanPlay

      public boolean ifCanPlay​(int x, int y, Card card)
      judge if the position (x,y) is fit to play a card
      参数:
      x - the coordinate x of card
      y - the coordinate y of card
      card - the card
      返回:
      true(can play) or false(can't play)
      另请参阅:
      Card

    • ifCanMove

      public boolean ifCanMove​(int x_from, int y_from, int x_to, int y_to)
      judge if the card in position(x_from,y_from) is able to be moved to (x_to, y_to)
      参数:
      x_from - the old coordinate x of card
      y_from - the old coordinate y of card
      x_to - the target coordinate x of card
      y_to - the target coordinate y of card
      返回:
      true(can move) or false(can't move)
      另请参阅:
      Card
